text: About me young careless feet%% Linger along the garish street;
Linger along the garish street; Above, a hundred shouting signs
Above, a hundred shouting signs%% Shed down their bright fantastic glow
Shed down their bright fantastic glow%% Upon the merry crowd and lines
Upon the merry crowd and lines%% Of moving carriages below.
Of moving carriages below. Oh wonderful is Broadway -- only
Oh wonderful is Broadway -- only%% My heart, my heart is lonely.
My heart, my heart is lonely. Desire naked, linked with Passion,
Desire naked, linked with Passion, Goes trutting by in brazen fashion;
Goes trutting by in brazen fashion; From playhouse, cabaret and inn
From playhouse, cabaret and inn%% The rainbow lights of Broadway blaze
The rainbow lights of Broadway blaze%% All gay without, all glad within;
All gay without, all glad within; As in a dream I stand and gaze
As in a dream I stand and gaze%% At Broadway, shining Broadway -- only
At Broadway, shining Broadway -- only%% My heart, my heart is lonely.
